Package element.position

Class RandomPosition

java.lang.Object
element.position.RandomPosition
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoinsHandler, PortalHandler
public abstract class RandomPosition extends Object
Abstract Class which contains functions that give random free positions on the maze.

    • getRandomPosition

      public PositionInterface getRandomPosition​(int max)
      function that returns a random free position on the maze.
      Parameters:
      max - maximum value for randomly generating an integer, this value is the max index of the empty tile list in maze
      Returns:
      returns a random empty position.
